page.title: 09 Education in Barham.
page.content: Pre-school village children go to Play School.Barham C.E.Primary school was built in 1858.Two infants' huts were added in 1967,making 6 classes in all.A hall was built in 1976.The P.T.A. built the swimming pool in 1968;it was heated later.At the moment the school has a metal climbing frame and adventure play ground,erected in 1979.The school field was farmers land before the K.E.C. bought it for a new school that has not yet been built. Children passing a selection procedure at 11 attend grammar schools in Canterbury.Alternative education is provided by 1 comprehensive and several secondary modern schools in Canterbury and Dover divisions. Hisoq is an educational centre which sets up courses for schools from different parts of the country.
